summary: This module provides a comprehensive test suite for the Modflow6 simulation components of the iMOD library. It sets up various groundwater model configurations, exercises simulation creation, partitioning, regridding, and I/O operations, and validates that model data, well definitions, and output controls are correctly preserved across serialization cycles and compatible with legacy formats.
business_intent: To guarantee the correctness and robustness of groundwater modeling workflows by automatically verifying that Modflow6 simulations can be constructed, manipulated, and exchanged reliably, thereby supporting developers and endâ€‘users in delivering accurate hydrological analyses.
